title: ubuntu-16.04-desktop-amd64.iso
description:
Ubuntu Desktop GNU/Linux 16.04 Xenial Xerus LTS x64
Long term support version of the famous free and open source OS.
64bit version.

Release Date â€“ 2016.04.21

System requirements (Recommended by Canonical):
- x64 capable CPU
- 2 GHz dual core processor or better
- 2+ GB RAM
- 25+ GB of free hard drive space
- Either a DVD drive or a USB port for the installer media
- Internet access is helpful

Installation guide: 
- Burn the ISO to DVD or use Rufus or Pendrive Linux program to create a bootable USB (if you use Windows) or Startup Disk Creator - (if you use Ubuntu).
- In the BIOS settings of your PC, select DVD drive / USB drive (respectively) as your First Boot Device.
- Follow the instructions of Ubuntu installer.
- When the PC restarts during installation - log on to BIOS (DEL key, or F2 or other button), and select your Hard Drive as the First Boot Device and remove the USB drive.
- The installation will continue and you will log on to your Ubuntu desktop.

Notes:
- Ubuntu LTS version will be supported for 5 years (until April 2021).
- Even though you can see the name 'amd64', the OS will work on any x86_64 CPU, both Intel or AMD. 

Enjoy and please seed!
